name: Saving the Climate, Mate
description:
In this point and click adventure submitted for the IndieCade 2021 Climate Jam you are trying to save the climate by visiting your past self. There are many ways to save energy and thus reduce CO2 emissions in your own home, but having a needy pet and a former self who does not know what he is doing certainly isn't helping!

HOW TO PLAY:

Move around by clicking on the objects and try to balance the temperature, oxygen in the room and CO2 emissions in a way that everyone can be happy. The rest is up to you to figure out!
